name: Edward MILLER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of June, 2006, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

899 A.2d 350
